lines.text: I think very few people are happy. They wait all their lives for something to happen to them - something great and wonderful. They don't know what it is but they wait for it. Sometimes it never happens. What they want is the kind of spirit I found in those letters. A spirit that makes life beautiful. I love that man. I loved him more than my own life. I still love him. So you see, I couldn't have loved Roger Moreland, the man I killed.
Call her... a pin-up girl of the spirit.
I couldn't possibly say what I'd like to say right now.
I'd like to say that you're lovely.
Go ahead, say it. I'd like to hear it.
